Container.Name: OctoEverywhere
Container.Overview:
Cloud empower your OctoPrint, Klipper, Bambu Lab, Elegoo, Prusa, Creality 3D printers with free, private, and unlimited remote access, AI print failure detection, and more! Developed for the maker community, powered by the maker community.
To use this plugin: 1) Get the required information for your 3D printer. 2) Install the Docker plugin in UnRaid using the information. 3) View the Docker container logs to get your account linking URL. 4) Make a new Docker container plugin for all your 3D printers!
To follow this link for a guide on how to get the required Docker variables for your 3D printer: https://octoeverywhere.com/r/docker
Features: 🚀 Free remote access to your full OctoPrint, Mainsail, Fluidd, and Bambu Lab web portals from anywhere. 🤖 Free & unlimited AI print failure detection will automatically stop failed prints, saving you time and money. 📷 Full resolution and full frame-rate webcam streaming. 📱 Empower your favorite OctoPrint & Klipper iOS and Android apps with remote access. 📺 Live stream your 3D prints to your friends or the world with Live Links. 🔔 Instant printer notifications sent to SMS, Email, Discord, Telegram, Slack, and more. 🔗 Share with others secure access to your OctoPrint, Fluidd, or Mainsail portal. 💪 Full OctoPrint plugin functionality. 🤹 Full multicam support. ... and much, much more!
OctoEverywhere is the best 3D printing cloud out there! Learn more @ https://octoeverywhere.com
Container.Category: Cloud: HomeAutomation: Productivity: Tools: Network:Web Network:Proxy Network:Management Status:Stable

Config.Name: Type
Config.Description: The plugin type you're setting up. MUST BE: bambu, elegoo, or klipper

Config.Name: Printer IP Address
Config.Description: (required for all types) The IP address of your 3D printer.

Config.Name: Bambu Lab Access Code
Config.Description: Only required for Bambu Lab plugins (see readme)

Config.Name: Bambu Lab Serial Number
Config.Description: Only required for Bambu Lab printers. (see readme)

Config.Name: Data Path
Config.Description: A unique folder for each plugin to store data.

Config.Name: Moonraker API Key
Config.Description: Optional For Klipper Plugins Types That Have Auth Enabled
